titleStmt.title: An entry from the Journals of Hensley Henson

sourceDesc.bibl: Edited from the manuscripts in the custody of Durham Cathedral Library.

p.hi: with the necessary reading for the 'Edinburgh' article

, and got in 3 hours at it during the day. After lunch I took Kitty for a drive in the motor car, to see the country. Two naval officers & an Austrian lady (names forgotten) had tea. We i.e. Ella, Kitty, & I, dined with the Bishop of Jarrow. Tupper–Carey was there.
